text: Withington railway station was a station in Withington, Herefordshire, England. The station was opened circa 1861 and closed in 1961 ==Planned reopened station== There are proposals for new stations on the Cotswold Line at Withington and Chipping Campden. ==References== ==Further reading== * Category:Disused railway stations in Herefordshire Category:Former Great Western Railway stations Category:Railway stations in Great Britain opened in 1861 Category:Railway stations in Great Britain closed in 1961
title: Withington railway station (Herefordshire)
